item.title: IBN
item.description: score:240 Chances: Efforts to bolster fee income, dependence on domestic loans and digitization of banking services will keep supporting ICICI Bank’s (IBN) financials. ICICI Bank (IBN) looks promising on the back of its digitization efforts, high dependence on domestic loans and revenue strength amid the current macroeconomic backdrop.
